projects.title: Guessing Game
projects.description: Guess the number is a guess the number game with a fun victory message. The object of the game is to try to guess a number between 0 and 100. The program will tell you if the number is higher or lower than the number you previously guessed.
projects.resources: This project is written entirely in react, and uses local storage to persist the high score.

projects.title: Mike Misiura
projects.description: A personal website designed by and about Mike Misiura to show the world my skills and the quality of my work.
projects.resources: This is a front end only project built using react, next, and javascript. It is hosted using ASW Amplify.

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.description: A social media website that allows users to log and post messages that everyone else who visits the website can read.
projects.resources: The back end of this project is written in typescript, the front end is written in react, and it accesses a my sequel database.

projects.title: Sales
projects.description: This is a sample front end or an admin to a sales site. To you sir is able to create, edit, and delete products to be sold on an e-commerce site.
projects.resources: This project is written in react, javascript, and bootstrap.

projects.title: Resume Webpage
projects.description: The homepage (only) of a website advertising my skills.
projects.resources: This page is coded entirely from HTML, CSS, and javascript. I did not use any frameworks.

projects.title: Stack Jam
projects.description: An e-commerce website that advertises and sells multiple products. Users can log in to persist their cart or write reviews. Users can also contact the owner through a message form.
projects.resources: This site is written in react front end, a typescript, node.js backend
